verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech So king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh, Solomon מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech was king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over all Israel ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim And these [were] the princes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֑וֹ lo; עֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Ya-hu which he had Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok of Zadok הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. the priest ס sa-Mek

אֱלִיחֹ֧רֶף <S%H456><s%> 'e-li-Cho-ref Elihoreph וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <S%H281><s%> va-'a-chi-Yah and Ahiah בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons שִׁישָׁ֖א <S%H7894><s%> shi-Sha of Shisha סֹפְרִ֑ים <S%H5608><s%> so-fe-Rim; scribes יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <S%H286><s%> 'a-chi-Lud of Ahilud הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> ham-maz-Kir. the recorder

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <S%H1141><s%> u-ve-na-Ya-hu And Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' of Jehoiada עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va; [was] over the host וְצָד֥וֹק <S%H6659><s%> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok וְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <S%H54><s%> ve-'ev-ya-Tar and Abiathar כֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nim. [were] the priests ס sa-Mek

וַעֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <S%H5838><s%> va-'a-zar-Ya-hu And Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan of Nathan עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַנִּצָּבִ֑ים <S%H5324><s%> han-nitz-tza-Vim; [was] over the officers וְזָב֧וּד <S%H2071><s%> ve-za-Vud and Zabud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נָתָ֛ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan of Nathan כֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> ko-Hen [was] principal officer רֵעֶ֥ה <S%H7463><s%> re-'Eh friend הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. [and] the king's

וַאֲחִישָׁ֖ר <S%H301><s%> va-'a-chi-Shar And Ahishar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- was over הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; [was] over the household וַאֲדֹנִירָ֥ם <S%H141><s%> va-'a-do-ni-Ram and Adoniram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַבְדָּ֖א <S%H5653><s%> 'av-Da of Abda עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַמַּֽס׃ <S%H4522><s%> ham-Mas. [was] over the tribute ס sa-Mek

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֞ה <S%H8010><s%> ve-lish-lo-Moh And Solomon שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֤ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten נִצָּבִים֙ <S%H5324><s%> nitz-tza-Vim officers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, over all Israel וְכִלְכְּל֥וּ <S%H3557><s%> ve-chil-ke-Lu which provided victuals אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech for the king וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; and his household חֹ֧דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh his month בַּשָּׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah in a year יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over; אֶחָד 'e-chad כהָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad a קלְכַלְכֵּֽל׃ <S%H3557><s%> le-chal-Kel. made provision ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> she-mo-Tam, And these [are] their names בֶּן־ ben- ח֖וּר <S%H1133><s%> chur The son of Hur בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim. Ephraim ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- דֶּ֛קֶר <S%H1128><s%> De-ker Ben-deker בְּמָקַ֥ץ <S%H4739><s%> be-ma-Katz in Makaz וּבְשַֽׁעַלְבִ֖ים <S%H8169><s%> u-ve-sha-'al-Vim and in Shaalbim וּבֵ֣ית u-Veit שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> Sha-mesh; and Bethshemesh וְאֵיל֖וֹן ve-'ei-Lon בֵּ֥ית beit חָנָֽן׃ <S%H358><s%> cha-Nan. and Elonbethhanan ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- חֶ֖סֶד <S%H1136><s%> Che-sed Ben-hesed בָּֽאֲרֻבּ֑וֹת <S%H700><s%> ba-'a-rub-Bot; in Aruboth ל֥וֹ lo שֹׂכֹ֖ה <S%H7755><s%> so-Choh to him [pertained] Sochoh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz and all the land חֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer. of Hepher ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <S%H1125><s%> 'a-vi-na-Dav The son of Abinadab כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נָ֣פַת <S%H5299><s%> Na-fat in all the region דֹּ֑אר <S%H1756><s%> Dor; of Dor טָפַת֙ <S%H2955><s%> ta-Fat which had Taphath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh, of Solomon הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah become לּ֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife ס sa-Mek

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <S%H1195><s%> ba-'a-Na Baana בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחִיל֔וּד <S%H286><s%> 'a-chi-Lud, of Ahilud תַּעְנַ֖ךְ <S%H8590><s%> ta'-Nach [to him pertained] Taanach וּמְגִדּ֑וֹ <S%H4023><s%> u-me-gid-Do; and Megiddo וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בֵּ֣ית beit שְׁאָ֡ן <S%H1052><s%> she-'An and all Bethshean אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֵ֨צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel which [is] by צָרְתַ֜נָה <S%H6891><s%> tza-re-Ta-nah Zartanah מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash לְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> le-yiz-re-'El, beneath Jezreel מִבֵּ֤ית mib-Beit שְׁאָן֙ <S%H1052><s%> she-'An from Bethshean עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far אָבֵ֣ל 'a-Vel מְחוֹלָ֔ה <S%H65><s%> me-cho-Lah, to Abelmeholah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver [even] unto [the place that is] beyond לְיָקְמֳעָֽם׃ <S%H3361><s%> le-ya-ke-mo-'Am. Jokneam ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- גֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1127><s%> Ge-ver The son of Geber בְּרָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> be-ra-Mot Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad; which [are] in Gilead ל֡וֹ lo חַוֹּת֩ <S%H2333><s%> chav-Vot to him [pertained] the towns יָאִ֨יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir of Jair בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּגִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> bag-gil-'Ad, Gilead ל֚וֹ lo חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel to him [also pertained] the region אַרְגֹּב֙ <S%H709><s%> ar-Go of Argob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan, which [is] in Bashan שִׁשִּׁים֙ <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim threescore עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot, great חוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah with walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-Ri-ach bars נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. and brasen ס sa-Mek
אֲחִֽינָדָ֥ב <S%H292><s%> 'a-chi-na-Dav Ahinadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עִדֹּ֖א <S%H5714><s%> 'id-Do of Iddo מַחֲנָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4266><s%> ma-cha-Na-ye-mah. [had] Mahanaim

אֲחִימַ֖עַץ <S%H290><s%> 'a-chi-Ma-'atz Ahimaaz בְּנַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> be-naf-ta-Li; [was] in Naphtali גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he לָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach he also took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <S%H1315><s%> ba-se-Mat Basmath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh of Solomon לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <S%H1195><s%> ba-'a-Na Baanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חוּשָׁ֔י <S%H2365><s%> chu-Shai, of Hushai בְּאָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> be-'a-Sher [was] in Asher וּבְעָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1175><s%> u-ve-'a-Lot. and in Aloth ס sa-Mek
יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פָּר֖וּחַ <S%H6515><s%> pa-Ru-ach of Paruah בְּיִשָׂשכָֽר׃ <S%H3485><s%> be-yi-so-sh-Char. in Issachar ס sa-Mek
שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I Shimei בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֵלָ֖א <S%H414><s%> 'e-La of Elah בְּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> be-vin-ya-Min. in Benjamin ס sa-Mek

גֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1398><s%> Ge-ver Geber בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֻרִ֖י <S%H221><s%> 'u-Ri of Uri בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz [was] in the country גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad; of Gilead אֶ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [in] the country סִיח֣וֹן׀ <S%H5511><s%> si-Chon of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites וְעֹג֙ <S%H5747><s%> ve-'Og and of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan וּנְצִ֥יב <S%H5333><s%> u-ne-Tziv officer אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and [he was] the only אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. which [was] in the land

יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, [were] many כַּח֥וֹל <S%H2344><s%> ka-Chol as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam which [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro; in multitude אֹכְלִ֥ים <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lim eating וְשֹׁתִ֖ים <S%H8354><s%> ve-sho-Tim and drinking וּשְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <S%H8056><s%> u-se-me-Chim. and making merry

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> u-she-lo-Moh, And Solomon הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become מוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel reigned בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chot, over all kingdoms מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har from the river אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz unto the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad and to גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul and unto the border מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <S%H5066><s%> mag-gi-Shim they brought מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah presents וְעֹבְדִ֥ים <S%H5647><s%> ve-'oe-Dim and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yav. of his life פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become לֶֽחֶם־ <S%H3899><s%> le-chem- provision שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh And Solomon's לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> le-Yom day אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; for one שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim was thirty כֹּר֙ <S%H3734><s%> kor measures סֹ֔לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let, of fine flour וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim and threescore כֹּ֖ר <S%H3734><s%> kor measures קָֽמַח׃ <S%H7058><s%> Ka-mach. of meal

עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah Ten בָקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar oxen בְּרִאִ֗ים <S%H1277><s%> be-ri-'Im, fat וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar oxen רְעִ֖י <S%H7471><s%> re-'I out of the pastures וּמֵ֣אָה <S%H3967><s%> u-Me-'ah and an hundred צֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> Tzon; sheep לְ֠בַד <S%H905><s%> Le-vad alone מֵֽאַיָּ֤ל <S%H354><s%> me-'ai-Yal beside harts וּצְבִי֙ <S%H6643><s%> u-tze-Vi and roebucks וְיַחְמ֔וּר <S%H3180><s%> ve-yach-Mur, and fallowdeer וּבַרְבֻּרִ֖ים <S%H1257><s%> u-var-bu-Rim fowl אֲבוּסִֽים׃ <S%H75><s%> 'a-vu-Sim. and fatted

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֞וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he רֹדֶ֣ה׀ <S%H7287><s%> ro-Deh For he had dominion בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol everything עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver over all [the region] on this side הַנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har, the river מִתִּפְסַח֙ <S%H8607><s%> mit-tif-Sach from Tiphsah וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- even עַזָּ֔ה <S%H5804><s%> 'az-Zah, even to Azzah בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מַלְכֵ֖י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei over all the kings עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har; the river וְשָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ve-sha-Lom, and he had peace הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had ל֛וֹ lo מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all עֲבָרָ֖יו <S%H5676><s%> 'a-va-Rav sides מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv. round about
